issues.title: Flesch Reading Ease Below Acceptable Range
issues.description: Flesch Reading Ease score is 48.5 (target: 70-80, acceptable: 60-85). Article is outside acceptable readability range.
issues.impact: HIGH - May reduce engagement and user comprehension for general audience. Complex reading level for horse-buying guides.

specific_fixes: Rewrite AKU section with shorter sentences
Add transition sentences between major sections
Use bullet points for complex explanations
Replace passive voice with active voice

issues.title: Missing Conflict of Interest Disclosure
issues.description: Article concludes with plug for 'kostenpflichtigen [PferdeWert Pony-Evaluator]' without conflict-of-interest disclosure or objectivity statement.
issues.impact: MEDIUM - Reduces trust signals. Readers may perceive article as sales-focused without transparency. Google may penalize lack of disclosure.
issues.specific_concern: Paid service promotion appears self-serving without context that article is provided by company offering the service
issues.missing_element: Transparency statement about company relationship and article objectivity
issues.recommendation: Add disclosure paragraph before/after paid service CTA explaining PferdeWert provides both guide and valuation services
issues.example_fix: Add: 'PferdeWert.de provides this guide as objective educational content. We also offer paid valuation services, but this guide is designed to help buyers make informed decisions independently.'
